content:
2023.
 * 9 February - Iona's toybox was updated from 1.24.1 to 1.25.2, using a new version of Fenforge, which included a bug fix for problems with device rotation on iOS 16.
 * 31 July - Iona's toybox was updated from 1.25.2 to 1.26.1, using a new version of Fenforge, which included bug fixes and optimizations.
 * Between 3 October and 7 December - Service for Iona's Toybox, the second game created using the Fenforge engine, was stopped due to the time required to implement the legislation of the UK Online Safety Act.
